# NICOTINE AIMD DATA
# train_loss[n] is the the training loss for every tenth step in the training, beginning with step 0 and ending with step 400.
# Same for energy_loss[n] and grad_loss[n]

train_loss = np.array([8.8779228403, 3.1780474411, 0.2745310768, 0.1800851400, 0.1477346633, 0.1195772871, 0.0971376717, 0.0799379531, 0.0672698323, 0.0579609548, 0.0513123772, 0.0462078152, 0.0421434326, 0.0387184392, 0.0357825627, 0.329073045, 0.0302214546, 0.0278982396, 0.0256432567, 0.0234555241, 0.0217184854, 0.0201208985, 0.0184736905, 0.0168078344, 0.0153293371, 0.0141137548, 0.0130489694, 0.0121947445, 0.0114992873, 0.0107566074, 0.0101211668, 0.0096371551, 0.0091817972, 0.0087962170, 0.0085042663, 0.0082186100, 0.0078682534, 0.0076065217, 0.0073438376, 0.0071313258, 0.0069169170])

energy_loss = np.array([8.8207993883, 3.0860244734, 0.0890386734, 0.0050527952, 0.0043869416, 0.0037558926, 0.0032568674, 0.0028795285, 0.0025666883, 0.0022877514, 0.0020493485, 0.0018669288, 0.0017061588, 0.0015847604, 0.0014763735, 0.0013773722, 0.0012814665, 0.0011839340, 0.0010886365, 0.0009849097, 0.0008895831, 0.0007984017, 0.0007099310, 0.0006146822, 0.0005368578, 0.0004732158, 0.0004164934, 0.0003720935, 0.0003362149, 0.0003084178, 0.0002897136, 0.0002767343, 0.0002637266, 0.0002523871, 0.0002406331, 0.0002306616, 0.0002238444, 0.0002178235, 0.0002081599, 0.0002021108, 0.0002005262])

grad_loss = train_loss - energy_loss

train_loss_400 = 0.0069169170
energy_loss_400 = 0.0002005262
